name: PacaPlus
description: The story follows a certain Kazuma Saeki who is living an ordinary high school life. Surrounded by friends, especially his cute girlfriend Yukari Izumi, his school days could not be any better.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
